short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify your Binance experience with Leto

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing our Google Chrome extension that simplifies the Binance website to only display your balance and the four most important buttons - send crypto, receive, sell via P2P and buy with fiat. We believe these are the essential functions for everyday users, while the rest of the features are geared towards traders.

Our extension is designed to enhance user experience and streamline the Binance interface. It's perfect for anyone who wants a more straightforward way to access their Binance account without being overwhelmed by unnecessary information.

We want to assure you that we do not collect any information on the site, and the extension code is open source on GitHub. This means you can trust that your personal data is safe and secure.

Download our Binance Simplifier extension today to make your Binance experience more efficient and user-friendly!
